Activity: Start the day by checking emails and responding to urgent requests. Review the progress on the previous goals.
Follow up with the graphic designer regarding the brochure and video production. Request a progress report and discuss any potential delays.
Begin working on the fourth goal: 'Ensure all marketing materials are compliant with SEC regulations.' Review all existing marketing materials for compliance with SEC regulations.
Consult with @comp-1 and @legal-1 to discuss specific SEC regulations related to marketing materials for hedge funds. @PEOPLE: Marketing Materials Compliance Review.
Identify any areas of non-compliance in the marketing materials and develop a plan to address them. Update the materials to ensure compliance with all applicable regulations.
Lunch break. Meet with other company members to discuss their work and progress.
Draft disclaimers and disclosures for the marketing materials. Ensure that the disclaimers are clear, concise, and conspicuous.
Submit the marketing materials to @comp-1 and @legal-1 for final review and approval. Incorporate any feedback and make any necessary revisions.
Prepare a checklist of all SEC regulations related to marketing materials for hedge funds. Use the checklist to ensure that all future marketing materials are compliant.
Summarize progress on the fourth goal and outline the next steps for tomorrow. Review emails and respond to any outstanding inquiries.
